definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: In addition, the number of the zenith delay parameters has effect on the tropospheric refraction.
sentences.chinese: 天顶延迟参数个数的选择对对流层折射有较大影响。

sentences.english: The tropospheric atmosphere refractivity of different laser wave length is expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了对流层不同波长激光的大气折射率。

sentences.english: As soon as the tropopause is reached, temperature stops decreasing with height.
sentences.chinese: 一达到对流层，温度就停止随高度上升。

sentences.english: Coupling between Tropospheric and Stratospheric Leading Modes.
sentences.chinese: 对流层和平流层主要模态之间的耦合。

sentences.english: The whole tropical tropopause has been warmed up from cold period to warm period.
sentences.chinese: 从偏冷期到偏暖期，整个热带对流层顶显著变暖。

sentences.english: The influence of the tropospheric refraction to the GPS positioning accuracy is explained in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对流层折射对GPS定位精度产生重要影响。

sentences.english: Troposphere delay error could be accurately determined using WVR.
sentences.chinese: 使用WVR能精确测定对流层时延误差。

sentences.english: The atmospheric radiation balance and the net radiation cooling rate in tropo-spheric layers.
sentences.chinese: 对流层内各层大气的辐射差额及其辐射冷却率。

sentences.english: Tropospheric Zenith Delay Prediction Accuracy for High-Precision GPS Positioning and Navigation.
sentences.chinese: 高精度GPS定位与导航的对流层天顶延迟预报精度。

sentences.english: The abandoned station of tropospheric communications.
sentences.chinese: 这个遗弃的工作站曾用于对流层通信。

sentences.english: Lightning is a common phenomenon of spark discharge of the air in the troposphere.
sentences.chinese: 闪电是常见的对流层大气火花放电现象。

sentences.english: In this paper, the forms of received signal in troposcatter communication are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简要阐述了对流层散射通信的接收信号的形式。

sentences.english: Lastly, a table of the curent military troposcatter communication equipments abroad is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文最后附表说明了外军对流层散射通信设备的现状。

sentences.english: The mission will also observe clouds and aerosol particles in the troposphere.
sentences.chinese: 此次任务还将观测对流层中的云和气溶胶粒子。

definition: lithosphere (in geology, the rigid crust of the earth)
